GSD.impact: Theft of private certificate keys, hashed password and/or session hijacking
GSD.description: In the ZeroSSL website https://app.zerossl.com an XSS exists in it that can be attacked via phishing resulting in theft of private certificate keys, hashed password and/or session hijacking. The vendor reports they "fixed the issue on the same day it was reported" and that the issue was reported Jan 4 of 2023.

OSV.summary: XSS in website version all current versions
OSV.details: In the ZeroSSL website https://app.zerossl.com an XSS exists in it that can be attacked via phishing resulting in theft of private certificate keys, hashed password and/or session hijacking. It is not clear if the vendor has fixed this issue or not at this time.
